text: Ani tya (stri) sarakhe ho'u naka, jine apale suta majabuta katalyanantara tukade tukade karuna takale ki tumhi apalya sapathanna apasata chala-kapatace nimitta banavave, yasathi ki eka gata dusarya gatapeksa ucca tharava. Khari gosta hica ki ya vayadyadvare allaha tumaci pariksa gheta ahe. Nihsansaya, sarvasrestha allaha tumacyasathi kayamatacya divasi tumhala pratyeka gostila spasta karuna sangela, jicyababata tumhi matabheda karita hote
